key.name: default-panel-icon
key.description: The default icon that will be visible in the panel.

key.name: valid-panel-icons
key.summary: Complete list of valid panel icons for the extension.
key.description: The paths have to be relative to the directory where the 'extension.js' file is located.

key.name: weather-refresh-seconds
key.description: (Currently Broken) The refresh rate for the weather statistics in seconds (works only if "Refresh Temperature/Humidity Sensors" is enabled).

key.name: refresh-weather
key.description: (Currently Broken) Whether or not you want to refresh the temperature and/or humidity sensor values.

key.name: show-weather-stats
key.description: Whether to show the temperature and/or humidity values (assuming you have provided the corresponding entity ids).

key.name: show-humidity
key.description: Whether to show humidity value or not.

key.name: temp-entity-id
key.description: Your Home Assistant EntityID for the temperature sensor.

key.name: humidity-entity-id
key.description: Your Home Assistant EntityID for the humidity sensor.

key.name: hass-access-token
key.description: Long Live Access Token for Home Assistant (Go to Profile->Bottom-of-the-page->Long-Live-Access-Tokens and create a new one).

key.name: hass-url
key.description: The url where your hass instance is hosted.

key.name: hass-togglable-entities
key.summary: Complete list of entity ids for home-assistant switches.
key.description: Full list of home assistant switches. It is meant to be filled automatically after pressing the 'Scan' button in the Preferences menu.

key.name: hass-enabled-entities
key.description: Entity ids for home-assistant switches. E.g. switch.livingroom_lights_relay.

key.name: hass-panel-sensor-ids
key.description: List of entity ids for the sensor values that you want to show in the panel .

key.name: hass-enabled-sensor-ids
key.summary: Entity ids for home assistant sensors.
key.description: Entity ids for home-assistant sensors. E.g. sensor.livingroom_temperature .

key.name: hass-runnable-entities
key.summary: Entity ids for home-assistant scenes and scripts.
key.description: Entity ids for home assistant scenes and scripts. E.g. scene.myscene.

key.name: hass-enabled-runnable-entities
key.summary: Entity ids for home assistant scenes and scripts displayed in the tray.
key.description: Entity ids for home assistant scenes and scripts displayed in the tray. E.g. scene.myscene.

key.name: hass-shortcut
key.description: Shortcut key on how to open the extension's menu from the tray.
